opportunities.title: Childcare Assistant - Little Stars Daycare
opportunities.description: Looking for caring individual to assist with childcare. Experience with children aged 2-5. Duties include supervising playtime, assisting with meals, and maintaining clean environment. Part-time position, flexible hours.

opportunities.title: Domestic Worker - Private Residence
opportunities.description: Seeking reliable domestic worker for cleaning, laundry, and general housekeeping. 3 days per week. Experience with cleaning and organizing required. Good pay for the right candidate.

opportunities.title: Office Cleaner - Corporate Building
opportunities.description: Evening cleaning position at corporate offices. Duties include vacuuming, mopping, sanitizing bathrooms, emptying bins. Monday to Friday, 5pm-9pm. No experience required, training provided.

opportunities.title: Seamstress - Clothing Alterations
opportunities.description: Experienced seamstress needed for clothing alterations and repairs. Must be skilled in sewing, hemming, and basic tailoring. Part-time or full-time available.

opportunities.title: Shop Assistant - Busy Retail Store
opportunities.description: Friendly and energetic shop assistant needed. Responsibilities include customer service, stock management, cash handling. Grade 10 minimum. Previous retail experience an advantage.

opportunities.title: Waitress - Restaurant & Bar
opportunities.description: Seeking friendly waitress for busy restaurant. Evening and weekend shifts available. Tips included. Must be reliable and have good customer service skills.

opportunities.title: Junior Software Developer
opportunities.description: Entry-level position for recent graduate or bootcamp completer. Skills needed: JavaScript, React, Node.js. Willing to train motivated candidates. Great opportunity to start your IT career.

opportunities.title: NSFAF Undergraduate Bursary 2026
opportunities.description: Full bursary for Namibian students pursuing undergraduate studies. Covers tuition, accommodation, and allowances. Open to Grade 12 learners with good academic record. Apply online.

opportunities.title: UNAM Merit Scholarship - Science & Engineering
opportunities.description: Merit-based scholarship for top performers in Mathematics and Science. Covers 75% of tuition fees. Minimum Grade 12 average of 65%. Application deadline: November 30.

opportunities.title: Hospitality Skills Training Program
opportunities.description: 6-month hospitality training covering customer service, food handling, housekeeping. Certificate upon completion. Free for unemployed youth aged 18-35. Placement assistance provided.

opportunities.title: Digital Skills Bootcamp
opportunities.description: 8-week intensive bootcamp in digital marketing, social media management, and basic graphic design. All levels welcome. Certificate provided. Limited spots available.

opportunities.title: Sewing & Tailoring Course
opportunities.description: Learn professional sewing and tailoring skills. 3-month course covers pattern making, garment construction, alterations. Tools provided. Start your own business or get employed.

opportunities.title: Marketing Internship
opportunities.description: 3-month paid internship in marketing department. Learn about campaigns, social media, content creation. Grade 12 or diploma required. Possible permanent position after completion.

opportunities.title: IT Support Internship
opportunities.description: 6-month learnership for aspiring IT professionals. Hands-on experience with troubleshooting, network setup, software installation. Basic computer knowledge required.

opportunities.title: Construction General Worker
opportunities.description: General laborers needed for construction sites. Physically demanding work. No experience required but must be fit and willing to learn. Daily pay available.

opportunities.title: Farm Worker - Livestock Care
opportunities.description: Farm workers needed for livestock care and general farm duties. Accommodation provided. Experience with animals preferred but not required. Honest and hardworking candidates welcome.

opportunities.title: Security Guard - Night Shift
opportunities.description: Security guards needed for night shifts at various locations. PSIRA certification required or willing to obtain. Reliable and alert individuals preferred.

opportunities.title: Nursing Assistant - Private Hospital
opportunities.description: Nursing assistant to support registered nurses. Patient care, vital signs monitoring, assisting with daily activities. Certificate in nursing assistance or similar required.

opportunities.title: Delivery Driver - Light Vehicle
opportunities.description: Delivery driver with valid Code B license. Deliver parcels around Windhoek. Own vehicle preferred but company vehicle available. Good pay plus fuel allowance.

opportunities.title: Aftercare Teacher - Primary School
opportunities.description: Aftercare teacher needed for primary school students. Supervise homework, organize activities, ensure student safety. Teaching qualification or experience with children required.

opportunities.title: Artisan Assistant - Open Pit Mine
opportunities.description: Assist maintenance team with mechanical and electrical repairs in open pit mine. Must be safety conscious and willing to work shifts. Mining experience an advantage.

opportunities.title: Auto Mechanic - Workshop Assistant
opportunities.description: Looking for skilled or semi-skilled auto mechanic to assist with car repairs and servicing. Knowledge of basic vehicle diagnostics required.

opportunities.title: Freelance Graphic Designer
opportunities.description: Freelance opportunity for creative designer. Create logos, posters, and social media graphics. Must have portfolio and own computer.

opportunities.title: Community Outreach Officer
opportunities.description: Support community projects focused on youth empowerment and education. Diploma in social work or community development required.

opportunities.title: Deckhand - Fishing Vessel
opportunities.description: Work aboard commercial fishing vessel. Duties include net handling, cleaning, and fish sorting. Must be physically fit and able to handle long sea trips.

opportunities.title: Street Mural Artist
opportunities.description: Seeking local artist to paint public mural as part of beautification project. Must submit design concept. Short-term contract.

opportunities.title: Bricklayer - Housing Project
opportunities.description: Experienced bricklayers needed for government housing project. Must be able to work in teams and meet deadlines. Tools provided.

opportunities.title: Truck Driver - Long Distance
opportunities.description: Experienced Code CE truck driver for regional routes. Must have valid PDP and 3+ years of experience. Accommodation during trips provided.

opportunities.title: Event Setup Crew - Weekend Work
opportunities.description: Part-time work setting up tents, chairs, and stages for events. Great for students. Must be punctual and physically fit.

opportunities.title: Safari Tour Guide
opportunities.description: Certified guide needed for safari tours. Must know local wildlife and safety procedures. Driver’s license and guiding certificate required.

opportunities.title: Street Food Vendor Assistant
opportunities.description: Assist food vendor with preparation, serving, and cash handling. Ideal for someone looking for informal work. Hygiene training preferred.

opportunities.title: Graduate Engineer - Civil
opportunities.description: Recent graduate opportunity. Assist with structural design, site inspections, and drafting. Degree in Civil Engineering required.

opportunities.title: Customer Service Agent
opportunities.description: Handle customer calls and support queries. Must have good communication and computer skills. Grade 12 required.

opportunities.title: Window Cleaner - High Rise Buildings
opportunities.description: Experienced cleaners for tall commercial buildings. Must not be afraid of heights. Safety training provided. Risk allowance included.

opportunities.title: Research Assistant - Climate Change
opportunities.description: Assist with fieldwork, data entry, and literature review for climate change impact study. Degree in Environmental Science preferred.

opportunities.title: Carpenter - Furniture Workshop
opportunities.description: Skilled carpenter needed for furniture production. Must know how to operate woodworking tools and read designs.

opportunities.title: Mathematics Tutor - Part Time
opportunities.description: Tutors needed for high school mathematics. Minimum requirement: A in Grade 12 math or diploma in education.

opportunities.title: Paramedic - Emergency Response
opportunities.description: Respond to medical emergencies and provide on-site care. Must have valid EMT/Paramedic certification and driver’s license.

opportunities.title: Hairdresser / Barber
opportunities.description: Experienced hairdresser or barber needed. Must know hair cutting, coloring, and styling. Commission-based earnings.

opportunities.title: Apprentice Plumber
opportunities.description: 12-month apprenticeship with certification. Learn pipe installation, maintenance, and water system repair. Tools and stipend provided.

opportunities.title: Agriculture Training - Crop Production
opportunities.description: Practical 6-month program in sustainable crop farming, irrigation, and pest control. Includes fieldwork and certificate upon completion.

opportunities.title: Engineering Excellence Scholarship
opportunities.description: Full scholarship for students pursuing Electrical or Mechanical Engineering degrees. Covers tuition and book allowances.

opportunities.title: Cash-in-Transit Officer
opportunities.description: High-risk security role transporting cash between banks. Must have firearm license, PSIRA registration, and good record.

opportunities.title: Electrician - Maintenance
opportunities.description: Qualified electrician needed for factory maintenance. Trade test required. Must understand industrial circuits and safety protocols.

opportunities.title: Online English Tutor (Remote)
opportunities.description: Teach conversational English online to international students. Fluent English required. Training provided.

opportunities.title: Car Wash Attendant
opportunities.description: Wash and detail vehicles at busy car wash. Must be hardworking and reliable. Daily pay available.

opportunities.title: Catering Assistant - Events
opportunities.description: Assist with food preparation and serving at events. Must follow hygiene standards. Evening and weekend work.

opportunities.title: Tender: Supply of Cleaning Materials
opportunities.description: Small and medium enterprises invited to bid for supply of cleaning materials to schools. Preference to local suppliers. Closing date: Nov 15, 2025.

opportunities.title: Boilermaker Apprentice
opportunities.description: Two-year apprenticeship with hands-on training in metal fabrication, welding, and maintenance. Matric with Math and Science required.

opportunities.title: Street Vendor - Fresh Produce Spot Available
opportunities.description: Market stall available for small-scale vegetable or fruit vendors. Monthly permit required. Ideal for unemployed youth or women entrepreneurs.

opportunities.title: Freelance Copywriter - Online
opportunities.description: Write blogs and marketing content for international clients. Pay per article. Fluent English and good writing skills required.

opportunities.title: Youth Entrepreneurship Bootcamp
opportunities.description: 4-week business training for young entrepreneurs aged 18–35. Learn business planning, finance, and marketing. Best ideas receive startup grants.

opportunities.title: Seasonal Harvester - Maize Farm
opportunities.description: Seasonal labor needed for maize harvesting. Physical work under sun, meals provided. Short-term contract (1 month).

opportunities.title: Firefighter Trainee Program
opportunities.description: Recruiting trainee firefighters. Must be physically fit and have Grade 12. Paid training and permanent employment upon completion.

opportunities.title: Welder - Metal Fabrication Shop
opportunities.description: Experienced welder needed for metal gate and tank fabrication. Trade certificate preferred but not required if skilled.

opportunities.title: Tender: Catering Services for Training Workshop
opportunities.description: Small catering companies invited to submit bids to provide meals during a 5-day training workshop. Deadline: Nov 10, 2025.

opportunities.title: Sound Technician - Concert Events
opportunities.description: Operate sound systems during live events. Must have technical understanding of mixing equipment. Weekend work included.

opportunities.title: Casual Worker - Moving Company
opportunities.description: Assist with packing and moving household furniture. One-day or weekend shifts available. Daily pay (cash).

opportunities.title: Cashier - Grocery Store
opportunities.description: Responsible for handling transactions and assisting customers. Grade 10 minimum. Previous cashier experience preferred.

opportunities.title: Start an Online Shop - Free E-commerce Training
opportunities.description: Learn to set up an online store and sell products using local payment systems. Free mentorship for youth entrepreneurs.

opportunities.title: Mobile Phone Repair Technician
opportunities.description: Technician needed for phone and tablet repairs. Must know soldering and screen replacement. Tools provided.

opportunities.title: Radio Presenter Internship
opportunities.description: Intern radio presenters wanted. Learn on-air broadcasting, production, and social media engagement. Passion for music a must.

opportunities.title: Environmental Field Assistant
opportunities.description: Assist with collecting samples, monitoring wildlife, and site surveys. Outdoor work, travel required. Degree not mandatory.

opportunities.title: Handmade Jewelry Artisan
opportunities.description: Join cooperative of artisans producing handmade jewelry for export. Training in design and marketing included.

opportunities.title: Truck Loader - Warehouse
opportunities.description: Assist drivers in loading and unloading goods. Must be fit and available for shift work. Basic literacy required.

opportunities.title: Live-in Nanny
opportunities.description: Full-time nanny for 2 children. Accommodation and meals provided. Must have experience with infants.

opportunities.title: Freelance Event Photographer
opportunities.description: Capture photos during weddings and events. Must have own camera and portfolio. Pay per event.

opportunities.title: Beach Lifeguard - Seasonal
opportunities.description: Trained lifeguards needed for beach season. Must have swimming certificate and CPR training. Uniform provided.

opportunities.title: Data Entry Clerk (Remote)
opportunities.description: Work-from-home data entry position. Must be detail-oriented and have access to computer and internet. Paid per task.

opportunities.title: Taxi Driver (Self-Employed Opportunity)
opportunities.description: Rent-to-own taxi opportunity. Requires valid driver’s license and PDP. Weekly rental fee, keep your profits.

opportunities.title: Pastry Chef Apprentice
opportunities.description: 12-month apprenticeship in baking and pastry. Learn decorating, dough prep, and customer service. Stipend provided.

opportunities.title: Art Workshop - Learn Painting
opportunities.description: Weekend painting workshop for beginners. Materials provided. Participants can sell art through local gallery.

opportunities.title: Vocational Bursary - Technical Colleges
opportunities.description: Bursary covering tuition for vocational fields like plumbing, welding, and carpentry. Open to youth under 30.

opportunities.title: Wildlife Ranger - Conservation Area
opportunities.description: Monitor wildlife and assist with patrols. Outdoor work, sometimes in remote areas. Basic training provided.

opportunities.title: Electrical Engineering Internship
opportunities.description: 12-month internship for electrical engineering graduates. Work in maintenance and design departments. Stipend included.

opportunities.title: Cybersecurity Awareness Course
opportunities.description: Learn online safety and cybersecurity basics. Free for students and youth. Certificate issued upon completion.

opportunities.title: IT Support Technician Training
opportunities.description: 6-month hands-on course covering computer repair, networking, and helpdesk support. Suitable for beginners.

opportunities.title: Engineering Bursary Program 2025
opportunities.description: Full bursary for students studying electrical, civil, or mechanical engineering at recognized universities in Namibia.

opportunities.title: Public Health Internship
opportunities.description: 12-month internship for public health or nursing graduates. Gain field experience in clinics and health outreach programs.

opportunities.title: Agricultural Innovation Fellowship
opportunities.description: Support for young innovators improving farming systems or food security. Includes mentorship, funding, and field visits.

opportunities.title: Digital Marketing Bootcamp
opportunities.description: 4-week virtual training in social media marketing, SEO, and content creation. Free for unemployed youth under 30.

opportunities.title: Environmental Studies Bursary
opportunities.description: Partial bursary for students pursuing degrees in conservation, climate science, or environmental management.

opportunities.title: Journalism & Media Internship
opportunities.description: 3-month internship for aspiring journalists. Learn editing, reporting, and digital content creation.

opportunities.title: African Youth Leadership Fellowship
opportunities.description: Fully funded leadership fellowship for young African changemakers. Includes 6-week residency at a US university.

opportunities.title: Creative Arts & Design Workshop
opportunities.description: Intensive 5-day workshop in design thinking and creative entrepreneurship for artists and crafters.

opportunities.title: Software Development Bursary
opportunities.description: Scholarship for students pursuing computer science or IT at accredited Namibian universities.

opportunities.title: Community Health Worker Training
opportunities.description: Basic health and first-aid course for rural volunteers. Certified by the Ministry of Health.

opportunities.title: Accounting Graduate Internship
opportunities.description: 12-month paid internship for accounting graduates pursuing CA qualification.

opportunities.title: Building & Construction Skills Course
opportunities.description: Learn practical skills in bricklaying, tiling, and plastering. Short-term accredited program.

opportunities.title: Business & Innovation Fellowship
opportunities.description: Funding and mentorship for early-stage African entrepreneurs. Includes business plan training and seed capital.

opportunities.title: Nursing Scholarship - 2025 Intake
opportunities.description: Full scholarship for nursing students accepted to government training institutions.

opportunities.title: Smart Agriculture Training
opportunities.description: Learn hydroponics and climate-smart farming techniques. Ideal for small-scale farmers and youth cooperatives.

opportunities.title: Legal Internship - Public Defender’s Office
opportunities.description: Graduate internship assisting public defenders with legal research and case preparation.

opportunities.title: Fine Arts Scholarship
opportunities.description: Partial funding for visual arts, dance, and theatre students. Must submit a creative portfolio.

opportunities.title: Tourism & Hospitality Certificate Course
opportunities.organization: Namibia University of Science and Technology (NUST)
opportunities.description: Professional certificate in tourism management and customer service. Includes internship placement.
